title: Misfit Announces 'Shine 2' With Multicolor LEDs, Vibration Motor for Alerts
text:
Misfit Announces 'Shine 2' With Multicolor LEDs, Vibration Motor for Alerts 
Published By: MacRumors.com - Yesterday 
Misfit today debuted its second-generation Shine activity tracker, which has been redesigned to incorporate new technology. The Shine 2 is t...
